snippet.title: Ocean Keeper Gameplay Trailer | Steam Next Fest 2024
snippet.description:
🌊Experience the latest visuals and updates in our new trailer for #OceanKeeper, a captivating roguelike survival game that plunges you into the depths of the ocean. Uncover the mysteries and challenges that await in this thrilling underwater adventure.

📢Now Streaming on Steam: Join the adventure today and explore the unknown waters with Ocean Keeper, available now for you to dive into.

🤖Coming Soon Across All Major Platforms: Prepare for more excitement as Ocean Keeper is set to make waves soon on Xbox, iOS, Android, and Nintendo Switch. Gear up to take your survival tactics to a variety of platforms and conquer the aquatic depths wherever you go.

👾Embark on Your Underwater Adventure: With Ocean Keeper, every dive is a step into the vast and mysterious. Don’t miss this journey into the deep—start your adventure now!

Subscribe now!✨

Wishlist on steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2845630/Codename_Ocean_Keeper/

Join on discord -  https://discord.gg/vyKNJKeaKj

#steamnextfest #roguelike #pcgaming #gametrailers #indiegames #nintendo #steamdeck #xbox
